author: Sarah Kaplan, Laurie McGinley, Carolyn Y Johnson, Lenny Bernstein, Sarah Kaplan, Laurie McGinley, Carolyn Y Johnson, Lenny Bernstein
title: Coronavirus damages kidneys and hearts as well as lungs, US doctors find
description: Clinicians around world have seen evidence Covid-19 is also causing heart inflammation, acute kidney disease, neurological malfunction, blood clots, intestinal damage and liver problems
content:
The new coronavirus kills by inflaming and clogging the tiny air sacs in the lungs, choking off the bodys oxygen supply until it shuts down the organs essential for life.
But clinicians around the world are seeing evidence that suggests the virus also may be… [+12740 chars]
